contentrichtext.text: {{refimprove|date=August 2009}} <!-- take discussion to TALK please!--> ''This article refers to the original '''Ziptorrent''' C++ Bittorrent client, '''and''' the 2007 version of Azureus modified specifically by MediaDefender Inc. to disrupt Bittorrent downloads.'' {{Infobox Software | name = ZipTorrent | screenshot =<!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:ZipTorrent-1.3.4.0-on-Windo.png|250px]] --> | caption = ZipTorrent 1.3.4.0 on Windows XP | developer = ZipTorrent developers | programming language = C++ | frequently updated = yes <!-- Release version update? Don't edit this page, just click on the version number! --> | operating_system = [[Microsoft Windows]] | genre = [[BitTorrent client]] | license = ? | website = n/a (previously [http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://ZipTorrent.com ZipTorrent.com]) }} '''ZipTorrent''' was a [[BitTorrent client]] written entirely using [[C++]] with the intention of being small and fast. The last known version, 1.3.7.3, was released in 2005, and development has stopped. ==Main features== * Built-in [[RSS (file format)|RSS]] Reader, with the ability to track many concurrent feeds * Built-in [[IRC]] Client, with the ability to connect to many networks at once, and the ability to send each other torrent files via DCC, or via direct links (URL's) to torrents. * Automatic content catcher - Enter your desired keywords, your undesired keywords, and ZipTorrent will automatically fish for such content on RSS and on IRC channels, and automatically download that content for you. * Torrent Archive "wakes up" dormant torrents when your computer is not used ==3rd Party Software used== * [[XPCOM]] (Mozilla Foundation) * [[Microsoft Foundation Class Library]] (Microsoft) * [[Libtorrent]] (Arvid Norberg) * [[TinyXML]] (Lee Thomason) ==MediaDefender "ZipTorrent"== In 2007 [[MediaDefender]] Inc. created a modification of the popular bittorrent client [[Vuze|Azureus]], taking over the name "ZipTorrent".<ref>[http://torrentfreak.com/ziptorrent-pollutes-and-slows-down-popular-torrents/ ZipTorrent Pollutes and Slows Down Popular Torrents]</ref> This modification is in no way associated with the original ZipTorrent standalone client. The MediaDefender Ziptorrent is designed to simulate (spoof) other clients and hinder Bittorrent traffic. ==References== {{reflist}} {{BitTorrent}} [[Category:BitTorrent clients]] [[Category:C++ software]] [[Category:Windows-only software]]
